ComicInfo.Summary: ...At the Bottom of the Bay!: The Hulk relentlessly pursues Curtiss Jackson through the San Francisco Bay, rescuing Fred Sloan before Jackson escapes. SHIELD super-agent Marvel Man confronts the Hulk but one punch takes him down.
